definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: violate, ravish (Mass. think verb obscene, and subst. [[שָׁכַב]]);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fpl. [[תִּשָּׁגַלְנׇה]] Is 13:16, Zec 14:2 women shall be ravished (both Kt; Qr [[תִּשְּׁכַבְנׇה]]).

definitions.title: Pu. < Qal pass.
definitions.body: (Ges:§ 52 e) Pf. 2 fs. [[אֵיפׂה לאׁ שֻׁגַּלְתְּ]] Je 3:2 where hast thou not been ravished ? (Qr [[שֻׁכַּבְתְּ]]).
